name: Jose Padilla / Satin Jackets 12" Vinyl
description:
• MELOR032 / MELOR032BAG
  • Satin Jackets / Jose Padilla ââ Come On / Elixir (Chris Coco Remix) 12".
  • As an accompaniment to Chris Coco's My Summer Mixtape digital compilation, Melodica Recordings presents an exclusive, very limited 12" release combining the talent of Germany's Balearic maestro Satin Jackets, with Ibiza chill-out legend Jose Padilla. The vinyl also comes housed in a exclusive custom record bag, the ultimate Balearic accessory for DJs, vinyl lovers and beach bums. Formed in 2010, Satin Jackets have been building a enviable reputation of late, with key releases on Eskimo, Toolroom and Hed Kandi to name but a few. 12-inch compatible arrangements, a spoonful or two of friskiness and addictive bass-lines unfold their magic, relying on nifty four-to-the-floor grooves topped off with a decent amount of glitter. Satin Jackets delivers glossy tunes wrapped in the lushness of modern club sound with that extra amount of basement les connoisseurs desire. Born in Barcelona, Jose Padilla moved to Ibiza in 1975, taking up the DJ residency at Cafe del Mar in 1991. His Cafe Del Mar compilation series, was regarded as the Zeitgeist of chillout music for the ten years that he was in control of the music selection. For this release, Padilla makes a rare solo appearance to deliver an advanced chill record, rich with strong rhythms and wave-like synth atmospheres, remixed into a bumpy, dusty jam my our man Chris Coco. The 12" is available on its own and as part of a limited release - My Summer Record Bag, that includes the vinyl, and a bespoke designer record bag made in collaboration with tuktuk. The heavy duty bag has enough room for a handful of 12"s, headphones, memory sticks and a special pocket to hold those all important 7" vinyl too. So, everything the retro contemporary DJ needs for a gig or a day on the beach.
Tote Bag (Optional)

  • Main bag compartment has magnetic stud fastening.
  • 1 x external '7" record' pocket with button fastening.
  • 2 x small internal zip pockets.
  • Bag strap fits easily over the shoulders so you can carry around comfortably. Strap length: 12.5"
  • Bag dimension: (W) 16.5 x (H) 17.5"
